# Credentials format

## Algorithmia

File: `algorithmia.json`

```
{
  "apiKey":"simvQrBBMTQd/2YF8BZPc5OMDMp1"
}
```

File: `watson-nlu.json`

```
{
  "apikey": "CfDoSN12o27NOdOVS1Asm7cAe4bVj6_HzevSGQDctkRM",
  "iam_apikey_description": "Auto generated apikey during resource-key operation for Instance - crn:v1:bluemix:public:natural-language-understanding:us-south:a/e5c2cff1970e45639a0fb0bd3cc85e3d:e11655ff-b5d3-4842-84b6-d8103815499f::",
  "iam_apikey_name": "auto-generated-apikey-71682b85-2c27-4286-a3df-0b26005407a5",
  "iam_role_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam::::serviceRole:Manager",
  "iam_serviceid_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam-identity::a/e5c2cff1970e45639a0fb0bd3cc85e3d::serviceid:ServiceId-69212258-48e8-46ba-bc0e-27f88ead10dd",
  "url": "https://gateway.watsonplatform.net/natural-language-understanding/api"
  }
```
